info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 3 at 11:54AM CDT until July 3 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
FFWMAF
The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Crane County in western Texas... Eastern Ector County in western Texas... Western Midland County in western Texas... Northwestern Upton County in western Texas...
* Until 300 PM CDT.
* At 1154 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Potentially 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Midland, Odessa, Crane, West Odessa, Midland International Air and Space Port, Pleasant Farms, Crane County Airport, Odessa Schlemeyer Field and Warfield.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 3:00 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 3:00 PM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Crane, TX; Ector, TX; Midland, TX; Upton, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 3:00 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 3:00 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Crane, TX; Ector, TX; Midland, TX; Upton, TX
